snippet: SNYDER--Phoebe (Peggy) Leibowitz, of New York City, born in Baltimore, MD in 1922, economist trained at the University of Chicago, and mother of three, passed away peacefully on February 6. Wife of William Snyder, who predeceased her in 1998, she is survived by her children and spouses, Adam, Patricia, Trinka, Bruce, Dana and Jim. Also survived by her four grandchildren and spouses, Benjamin, Sarah, Melanie, Renato, Lili, and Kasey; and two nephews and spouses Alex, Maria, Daniel, and Kathleen; and their children Isabelle, Dylan, Mattie and Lucas. They will all miss her guidance on how to live life. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Young Center for Immigrant Children's Rights. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SNYDER, PHOEBE (PEGGY) LEIBOWITZ
